nodes.text: The Delcontrians were a group who were represented by a faction in the Galactic Senate of the Galactic Republic. They voted on the side of the Trade Federation regarding a proposed taxation bill, until Senator Palpatine of Naboo—truly the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Sidious, who secretly controlled the Trade Federation—insisted on a bypass amendment, which lost the Trade Federation the Delcontrian vote. However, Sidious, who had intended for the bill to fail, planned for the Delcontrian faction to return to allying with the Trade Federation in a future proposal.
